comply.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to do what you have to do or are asked to do
comply.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The newspaper was asked by federal agents for assistance and agreed to comply.
Failure to comply with the regulations will result in prosecution.
comply.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to obey a law or rule, or to keep an agreement
comply.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the high costs of upgrading aging mills to comply with environmental regulations
